docTitle.titlePart:
Effect of numerical aperture on signal level in cylindrical
waveguide evanescent fluorosensors

byline.docAuthor: Thomas R. Glass, Steve Lackie, and Tomas Hirschfeld

front.div:
The effect of numerical aperture on signal level from fluorescent substances or solutions in the evanescent
zone of a cylindrical waveguide is analyzed. The analysis applies to the case in which the fluorescence is
excited by the evanescent wave of a fiber and the fluorescence signal is that which tunnels back into the same
fiber. The analysis is for two cases: bulk fluorescence and fluorescence of a thin film layer. Experimental
results are also presented.
